Product Short Description: BookMyShow is India's Largest Entertainment Central. Movie Tickets, Event Tickets, Concert Tickets, Theatre Tickets and Sports Tickets.
Product Long Description: BookMyShow is India's biggest online movie and events ticketing brand. The website caters to ticket sales for movies, plays, concerts and sporting events via the online platform. Log on to in.bookmyshow.com or BookMyShow Mobile App. Select Location, Event, Venue, Show Date, Time and Seats of your preference as the logic flows. On payment page, click on the More Payment Options and click on the "Gift Voucher" tab to enter the gift card code in the text box that appears & click on "Apply" button to avail the offer. At the end of the successful transaction, Booking ID gets generated which needs to be exchanged at the Cinema / Venue Box Office for actual tickets. Email/SMS confirmation will be sent on the Email Address/Mobile Number provided while completing the transaction. Gift card can be redeemed ONLY on in.bookmyshow.com or BookMyShow Mobile App & cannot be redeemed directly at the cinema / venue / box office. For any assistance, reach out to BookMyShow Customer Support on +91(022)-61445050 or write to us on helpdesk@bookmyshow.com.

What better way to gift them this experience than through the PVR e-Gift card? It takes a few minutes to order and it's in your gift recipient's inbox in another few minutes.

Show your Gift Card details to the cashier at the time of billing & pay any balance amount by cash or card. To redeem online visit www.pvrcinemas.com, choose Gift Card as payment mode and enter Gift Card details.

Product Short Description: Swiggy is India's largest online food ordering and delivery platform founded in 2014. Apart from food delivery, Swiggy also provides on-demand grocery deliveries under the name Insta-mart and an instant package delivery service called Swiggy Genie.
Product Long Description: dining Master Template
Swiggy is India's largest online food ordering and delivery platform. Founded in 2014, Swiggy is based out of Bangalore, India and, as of October 2019, was operating out of 500+ Indian cities.
How to Redeem:

Access Swiggy Money from the account section in Swiggy App. You will then land on the Swiggy Money homepage. Click on Add Gift Card button, on the bottom of the page. Enter your 16 digit alphanumeric code and 6 digit PIN, press Add Gift Card. Swiggy validates the code and adds the denomination to your Swiggy Money account.

Product Short Description: There's nothing cookie-cutter about Pizza Hut. Not our pizzas. Not our people. And definitely not the way we live life. Around here, we don't settle for anything less than food we're proud to serve.
Product Long Description: Treat yourself to hot, cheesy, delicious pizzas from Pizza Hut. Along with its signature pan pizzas, Pizza Hut also offers a delightful range of sides, beverages, and desserts. Enjoy an indulgent meal with your friends and family at amazing prices!
How to redeem:

At Offline Outlets: Customer comes to Pizza Hut outlet and expresses his intent of using Gift Card as payment mode. Selects merchandise and shares gift card details with cashier. Cashier prepared invoice and selects gift card tender as payment mode. Submits gift card details i.e., Card number, and PIN and amount in suggested field. Qwikcilver system will validate card details and as a response will display card balance. On successful validation cashier will be prompted to click on redeem button, post confirmation from the customer clicks redemption button and card gets redeemed. On successful redemption total invoice value will get reduced by redeemed value. In case of the total invoice value goes higher than GC Redeemed value, customer is requested to opt for other mode of payment like credit / debit / wallet or cash for balance payment. On successful payment bill gets closed.

At Online (E-Commerce Portal( https://www.pizzahut.co.in/ ) / M-App): Customer selects the product. Reaches to checkout page to apply the voucher code/ coupon and Gift Card details. Selects Gift Card on Checkout. The first 5 digits of gift card will be pre-selected in the field, customer needs to input the balance digit only. Submit pin for validation post entering card details. System validates card details and displays available amount to redeem. Customer clicks on redemption button. On successful redemption total invoice value gets reduced by Gift Card redeemed value. System displays balance amount (if any) to be paid by customers. Customer pays the balance amount using another accepted mode of payment like Credit Card / Debit Card or wallet. Customer completes the checkout process; transaction gets completed and order gets confirmed.

Product Short Description: There is nothing cookie-cutter about Pizza Hut. Not our pizzas. Not our people. And definitely not the way we live life. Around here, we don't settle for anything less than food we are proud to serve.
Product Long Description: Treat yourself to hot, cheesy, delicious pizzas from Pizza Hut. Along with its signature pan pizzas, Pizza Hut also offers a delightful range of sides, beverages, and desserts. Enjoy an indulgent meal with your friends and family at amazing prices!
How to redeem:

At Offline Outlets: Customer comes to Pizza Hut outlet and expresses his intent of using Gift Card as payment mode. Selects merchandise and shares gift card details with cashier. Cashier prepared invoice and selects gift card tender as payment mode. Submits gift card details i.e., Card number, and PIN and amount in suggested field. Qwikcilver system will validate card details and as a response will display card balance. On successful validation cashier will be prompted to click on redeem button, post confirmation from the customer clicks redemption button and card gets redeemed. On successful redemption total invoice value will get reduced by redeemed value. In case of the total invoice value goes higher than GC Redeemed value, customer is requested to opt for other mode of payment like credit / debit / wallet or cash for balance payment. On successful payment bill gets closed.

At Online (E-Commerce Portal( https://www.pizzahut.co.in/ ) / M-App): Customer selects the product. Reaches to checkout page to apply the voucher code/ coupon and Gift Card details. Selects Gift Card on Checkout. The first 5 digits of gift card will be pre-selected in the field, customer needs to input the balance digit only. Submit pin for validation post entering card details. System validates card details and displays available amount to redeem. Customer clicks on redemption button. On successful redemption total invoice value gets reduced by Gift Card redeemed value. System displays balance amount (if any) to be paid by customers. Customer pays the balance amount using another accepted mode of payment like Credit Card / Debit Card or wallet. Customer completes the checkout process; transaction gets completed and order gets confirmed.

Product Long Description: It all started with Colonel Harland Sanders creating a finger lickin’ good recipe more than 75 years ago. The Colonel’s Secret Recipe continues to be as guarded; and our commitment towards Food, People and Planet remains as steadfast. With a new KFC restaurant opening every 6 hours, we power on to serve the World’s Tastiest Chicken!
1) Visit KFC website https://online.kfc.co.in/ or visit the listed outlet.

3) (For Website) Make your order and click on 'Place Order'
4) On the payment page choose 'Gift Card' option and enter the 'voucher code' and 'pin'
5) The bill amount should be equal to or less than the actual amount and not higher

Product Short Description: Tata CLiQ is the flagship digital commerce initiative of the Tata Group. It is a multi-category e-commerce platform, operating across categories such as Fashion, Footwear and Accessories, Electronics and more
Product Long Description: Want to express yourself with your own unique style? Need a pair of trendy shoes to go with your outfit? How about cool accessories to complete your look? Tata CliQ has it all! With 1200+ brands from India and around the world, Tata CliQ is India’s go to destination for all things fashion, lifestyle and beauty. Whether you are shopping for yourself or your loved ones, you can always count on Tata CliQ – everything is Hand-piQed and 100% AuthentiQ – sourced straight from the best brands and their authorised resellers from India and across the world. So what are you waiting for? Get CliQing!
Gift Cards may only be redeemed toward the purchase of eligible products on www.tatacliq.com
Login to Tata Cliq Account
Click your account
Select Cliq Cash option
Enter Gift Card Number
Enter PIN
Click on Add card to wallet to complete the addition of money to Tata Cliq Wallet.

While purchasing a product, on the payments page, click on Cliq cash to redeem the balance from the wallet Purchases are deducted from the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance. Any unused CLiQ cash balance will remain associated with the redeemer's tatacliq.com account and applied to purchases in order of earliest expiration date. If a purchase exceeds the redeemer's CLiQ Cash balance, the remaining amount must be paid with by credit card, net banking or debit card.

Product Short Description: EaseMyTrip is one of the largest online travel platforms in India, and a trusted name in the Indian travel industry. We offer "end to end" travel solutions including air tickets, hotel booking, cab and bus booking, train tickets and holiday packages
Product Long Description: EaseMyTrip commenced its operations in 2008 by focusing on the B2B2C (business to business to customer) distribution channel and providing travel agents access to its website to book domestic travel airline tickets in order to cater to the offline travel market in India. Subsequently, by leveraging its B2B2C channel, the company commenced operations in the B2C (business to customer) distribution channel in 2011 by primarily focusing on the growing Indian middle class population’s travel requirements. With our presence in the B2B2C and B2C channels, we were able to commence operations in the B2E (business to enterprise) distribution channel in 2013 with the aim of providing end-to-end travel solutions to corporates. Our presence in three distinct distribution channels provide us with a diversified customer base and wide distribution network. We have been providing customers with the option of no-convenience fee, such that customers are not required to pay any service fee in instances where there are no alternate discount or promotion coupon being availed. In our pricing model, we have endeavoured to avoid hidden costs, which result in increasing the final price payable by the customer. We believe that the strength of our brand, the quality of our services, our user-friendly websites (www.easemytrip.com and www.easemytrip.in), android and iOS based mobile applications (EaseMyTrip), our customer centric approach, as well as our efficient marketing programs have enabled us to develop significant market share in the domestic airline ticket business in India. In Fiscal 2019, GoAir, and SpiceJet, recognized us as amongst the top travel partners in terms of revenue and passenger count. The strength of our brand has increased significantly over the years.

Product Short Description: EaseMyTrip is one of the largest online travel platforms in India, and a trusted name in the Indian travel industry. We offer "end to end" travel solutions including air tickets, hotel booking, cab and bus booking, train tickets and holiday packages
Product Long Description: EaseMyTrip commenced its operations in 2008 by focusing on the B2B2C (business to business to customer) distribution channel and providing travel agents access to its website to book domestic travel airline tickets in order to cater to the offline travel market in India. Subsequently, by leveraging its B2B2C channel, the company commenced operations in the B2C (business to customer) distribution channel in 2011 by primarily focusing on the growing Indian middle class population’s travel requirements. With our presence in the B2B2C and B2C channels, we were able to commence operations in the B2E (business to enterprise) distribution channel in 2013 with the aim of providing end-to-end travel solutions to corporates. Our presence in three distinct distribution channels provide us with a diversified customer base and wide distribution network. We have been providing customers with the option of no-convenience fee, such that customers are not required to pay any service fee in instances where there are no alternate discount or promotion coupon being availed. In our pricing model, we have endeavoured to avoid hidden costs, which result in increasing the final price payable by the customer. We believe that the strength of our brand, the quality of our services, our user-friendly websites (www.easemytrip.com and www.easemytrip.in), android and iOS based mobile applications (EaseMyTrip), our customer centric approach, as well as our efficient marketing programs have enabled us to develop significant market share in the domestic airline ticket business in India. In Fiscal 2019, GoAir, and SpiceJet, recognized us as amongst the top travel partners in terms of revenue and passenger count. The strength of our brand has increased significantly over the years.

Product Short Description: MakeMyTrip is all about empowering the traveler with total control over his or her travel options. This includes flights, hotel bookings, car rentals, tour bookings and so much more.
Product Long Description: MakeMyTrip is all about empowering the traveler with total control over his or her travel options. This includes flights, hotel bookings, car rentals, tour bookings and so much more. Travelers just let MakeMyTrip know what they want, and MakeMyTrip organizes the entire travel package for them. The company was incepted by Deep Kalra in year 2000; today, MakeMyTrip is India’s top one-stop-travel-shop that the broadest selection of travel products and services in India. This Online Travel Leader has revolutionized the travel industry, understanding that the focus should be on the traveler and not on airlines or hotels. With MakeMyTrip, you can now enjoy instant booking and comprehensive travel choices along with around the clock customer support and services.

Product Short Description: Taj Hotels is a chain of luxury hotels and a subsidiary of the Indian Hotels Company Limited; headquartered at Express Towers, Nariman Point in Mumbai.
Product Long Description: Seeking the perfect gift? How about an extraordinary moment. Would you rather gift a refreshing staycation, an intimate candlelight dinner, or a rejuvenating massage, to a close one? Now you don’t have to choose. Introducing Taj Experiences our new gift card. Through this card, your privileged recipient can enjoy stays, dining, spa appointments, and many more indulgences at any Taj Hotel in India. They’ll always remember the experience, and the person who made it possible.

The cards can be redeemed at Taj, Vivanta or Gateway hotels in India for all valid spends at that hotel and at Taj Reservations Worldwide for prepaid room reservations. This does not include Ginger Hotels. For prepaid room reservations at Taj Reservations Worldwide the card number and PIN must be quoted when making the reservation. Valid card in its original form or e-mail must be presented at the time of availing a service.
